racialTraits.name: +2 Constitution, +2 Wisdom, -2 Charisma
racialTraits.description: Dwarves are both tough and wise, but also a bit gruff.

racialTraits.name: Medium
racialTraits.description: Dwarves are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

racialTraits.name: Slow and Steady
racialTraits.description: Dwarves have a base speed of 20 feet, but their speed is never modified by armor or encumbrance.

racialTraits.name: Darkvision
racialTraits.description: You can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

racialTraits.name: Darkvision
racialTraits.description: Dwarves can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

racialTraits.name: Defensive Training
racialTraits.description: Dwarves get a + dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant subtype.

racialTraits.name: Greed
racialTraits.description: Dwarves receive a +2 racial bonus on Appraise skill checks made to determine the price of nonmagical goods that contain precious metals or gemstones.

racialTraits.name: Hatred
racialTraits.description: Dwarves receive a +1 bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the orc and goblinoid subtypes due to special training against these hated foes.

racialTraits.name: Hardy
racialTraits.description: Dwarves receive a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison, spells, and spell-like abilities.

racialTraits.name: Stability
racialTraits.description: Dwarves receive a +4 racial bonus to their Combat Maneuver Defense when resisting a bull rush or trip attempt while standing on the ground.

racialTraits.name: Stonecunning
racialTraits.description: Dwarves receive a + bonus on Perception checks to potentially notice unusual stonework, such as traps and hidden doors located in stone walls or floors. They receive a check to notice such features whenever they pass within 10 feet of them, whether or not they are actively looking.

racialTraits.name: Weapon Familiarity
racialTraits.description: Dwarves are proficient with battleaxes, heavy picks, and warhammers, and treat any weapon with the word "dwarven" in its name as a martial weapon.

racialTraits.name: Languages
racialTraits.description: Dwarves begin play speaking Common and Dwarven. Dwarves with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: Giant, Gnome, Goblin, Orc, Terran, and Undercommon.

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Dwarf)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Dwarfs. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.

racialTraits.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, -2 Constitution
racialTraits.description: Elves are nimble, both in body and mind, but their form is frail.

racialTraits.name: Medium
racialTraits.description: Elves are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

racialTraits.name: Normal Speed
racialTraits.description: Elves have a base speed of 30 feet.

racialTraits.name: Low-Light Vision
racialTraits.description: You can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

racialTraits.name: Low-Light Vision
racialTraits.description: Elves can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

racialTraits.name: Elven Immunities
racialTraits.description: Elves are immune to magic sleep effects and get a +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells and effects.

racialTraits.name: Elven Magic
racialTraits.description: Elves receive a +2 racial bonus on caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance. In addition, elves receive a +2 racial bonus on Spellcraft skill checks made to identify the properties of magic items.

racialTraits.name: Keen Senses
racialTraits.description: Elves receive a + racial bonus on Perception skill checks.

racialTraits.name: Weapon Familiarity
racialTraits.description: Elves are proficient with longbows (including composite longbows), longswords, rapiers, and shortbows (including composite shortbows), and treat any weapon with the word "elven" in its name as a martial weapon.

racialTraits.name: Languages
racialTraits.description: Elves begin play speaking Common and Elven. Elves with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: Celestial, Draconic, Gnoll, Gnome, Goblin, Orc, and Sylvan.

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Elf)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Elfs. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.

racialTraits.name: +2 Constitution, +2 Charisma, -2 Strength
racialTraits.description: Gnomes are physically weak but surprisingly hardy, and their attitude makes them naturally agreeable.

racialTraits.name: Small
racialTraits.description: Gnomes are Small creatures and gain a +1 size bonus to their AC, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, a -1 penalty to their Combat Maneuver Bonus and Combat Maneuver Defense, and a +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.

racialTraits.name: Slow Speed
racialTraits.description: Gnomes have a base speed of 20 feet.

racialTraits.name: Low-Light Vision
racialTraits.description: You can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

racialTraits.name: Low-Light Vision
racialTraits.description: Gnomes can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

racialTraits.name: Defensive Training
racialTraits.description: Gnomes get a + dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant subtype.

racialTraits.name: Gnome Magic
racialTraits.description: Gnomes add + to the DC of any saving throws against illusion spells that they cast. Gnomes with a Charisma of 11 or higher also gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day--dancing lights, ghost sound, prestidigitation, and speak with animals. The caster level for these effects is equal to the gnome's level. The DC for these spells is equal to 10 + the spell's level + the gnome's Charisma modifier.

racialTraits.name: Hatred
racialTraits.description: Gnomes receive a + bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the reptilian and goblinoid subtypes due to special training against these hated foes.

racialTraits.name: Illusion Resistance
racialTraits.description: Gnomes get a +2 racial saving throw bonus against illusion spells and effects.

racialTraits.name: Keen Senses
racialTraits.description: Gnomes receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception skill checks.

racialTraits.name: Obsessive
racialTraits.description: Gnomes receive a +2 racial bonus on a Craft or Profession skill of their choice.

racialTraits.name: Weapon Familiarity
racialTraits.description: Gnomes treat any weapon with the word "gnome" in its name as a martial weapon.

racialTraits.name: Languages
racialTraits.description: Gnomes begin play speaking Common, Gnome, and Sylvan. Gnomes with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: Draconic, Dwarven, Elven, Giant, Goblin, and Orc.

racialTraits.name: Obsessive Craft Bonus
racialTraits.description: Gnomes receive a +2 racial bonus on a Craft skill of their choice.

racialTraits.name: Obsessive Profession Bonus
racialTraits.description: Gnomes receive a +2 racial bonus on a Profession skill of their choice.

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Gnome)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Gnomes. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.

racialTraits.name: +2 to One Ability Score
racialTraits.description: Half-elf characters get a +2 bonus to one ability score of their choice at creation to represent their varied nature.

racialTraits.name: Medium
racialTraits.description: Half-elves are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

racialTraits.name: Normal Speed
racialTraits.description: Half-elves have a base speed of 30 feet.

racialTraits.name: Low-Light Vision
racialTraits.description: You can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

racialTraits.name: Low-Light Vision
racialTraits.description: Half-elves can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

racialTraits.name: Adaptability
racialTraits.description: Half-elves receive Skill Focus as a bonus feat at 1st level.

racialTraits.name: Elf Blood
racialTraits.description: Half-elves count as both elves and humans for any effect related to race.

racialTraits.name: Elven Immunities
racialTraits.description: Half-elves are immune to magic sleep effects and get a +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells and effects.

racialTraits.name: Keen Senses
racialTraits.description: Half-elves receive a + racial bonus on Perception skill checks.

racialTraits.name: Multitalented
racialTraits.description: Half-elves choose two favored classes at first level and gain +1 hit point or +1 skill point whenever they take a level in either one of those classes.

racialTraits.name: Languages
racialTraits.description: Half-elves begin play speaking Common and Elven. Half-elves with high Intelligence scores can choose any languages they want (except secret languages, such as Druidic).

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Human)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Humans. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Elf)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Elfs. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Human)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Humans. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.

racialTraits.name: +2 to One Ability Score
racialTraits.description: Half-orc characters get a +2 bonus to one ability score of their choice at creation to represent their varied nature.

racialTraits.name: Medium
racialTraits.description: Half-orcs are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

racialTraits.name: Normal Speed
racialTraits.description: Half-orcs have a base speed of 30 feet.

racialTraits.name: Darkvision
racialTraits.description: You can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

racialTraits.name: Darkvision
racialTraits.description: Half-orcs can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

racialTraits.name: Intimidating
racialTraits.description: Half-orcs receive a +2 racial bonus on Intimidate skill checks due to their fearsome nature.

racialTraits.name: Orc Blood
racialTraits.description: Half-orcs count as both humans and orcs for any effect related to race.

racialTraits.name: Orc Ferocity
racialTraits.description: Once

racialTraits.name: Weapon Familiarity
racialTraits.description: Half-orcs are proficient with greataxes and falchions and treat any weapon with the word "orc" in its name as a martial weapon.

racialTraits.name: Languages
racialTraits.description: Half-orcs begin play speaking Common and Orc. Half-orcs with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: Abyssal, Draconic, Giant, Gnoll, and Goblin.

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Human)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Humans. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Orc)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Orcs. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.

racialTraits.name: +2 Dexterity, +2 Charisma, -2 Strength
racialTraits.description: Halflings are nimble and strong-willed, but their small stature makes them weaker than other races.

racialTraits.name: Small
racialTraits.description: Halflings are Small creatures and gain a +1 size bonus to their AC, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, a -1 penalty to their Combat Maneuver Bonus and Combat Maneuver Defense, and a +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.

racialTraits.name: Slow Speed
racialTraits.description: Halflings have a base speed of 20 feet.

racialTraits.name: Fearless
racialTraits.description: Halflings receive a +2 racial bonus on all saving throws against fear. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by halfling luck.

racialTraits.name: Halfling Luck
racialTraits.description: Halflings receive a +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.

racialTraits.name: Keen Senses
racialTraits.description: Halflings receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception skill checks.

racialTraits.name: Sure-Footed
racialTraits.description: Halflings receive a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics and Climb skill checks.

racialTraits.name: Weapon Familiarity
racialTraits.description: Halflings are proficient with slings and treat any weapon with the word "halfling" in its name as a martial weapon.

racialTraits.name: Languages
racialTraits.description: Halflings begin play speaking Common and Halfling. Halflings with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: Dwarven, Elven, Gnome, and Goblin.

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Halfling)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Halflings. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.

racialTraits.name: +2 to One Ability Score
racialTraits.description: Human characters get a +2 bonus to one ability score of their choice at creation to represent their varied nature.

racialTraits.name: Medium
racialTraits.description: Humans are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

racialTraits.name: Normal Speed
racialTraits.description: Humans have a base speed of 30 feet.

racialTraits.name: Bonus Feat
racialTraits.description: Humans select one extra feat at 1st level.

racialTraits.name: Skilled
racialTraits.description: Humans gain an additional skill rank at 1st level and one additional rank whenever they gain a level.

racialTraits.name: Languages
racialTraits.description: Humans begin play speaking Common. Humans with high Intelligence scores can choose any languages they want (except secret languages, such as Druidic).

racialTraits.name: Humanoid (Human)
racialTraits.description: You gain a + bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks when using these skills against Humans. Likewise, you get a + bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against such creatures. You may make Knowledge Skill checks untrained to identify such creatures.
